oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Morrisonville, Christian Co., Ill., Feb. 1901
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sanborn-Perris Map Co.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fire insurance
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Scale 1:600. 50 ft. to 1 in.
Sheet 1 includes symbol key, index, and index map.
Partial cadastral map.
Fire insurance map hand colored to show building construction, locations of windows and doors, elevators, and available water facilities.
Also shows factories, commercial occupancy of buildings, property boundaries and house and block numbers.

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Stockyards
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fire insurance map hand colored to show building construction and available water facilities.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Insurance maps of Chicago Grain Elevators, 1901.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sanborn Map Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fire risk assessment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Scale 1:600. 50 ft. to 1 in.
Also shows factories, commercial occupancy of buildings, property boundaries, and block numbers.
Fire insurance map hand colored to show building construction, locations of windows and doors, and available water facilities.
Index and key map include listing of elevator companies.
Originally issued as bound volume.
Partial cadastral map.
Sheets numbered 1-58
Symbol key on key map sheet.
title page, key map, and street index on 2 unnumbered sheets.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Insurance maps of Chicago, Illinois. Volume I
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sanborn Map Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fire risk assessment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Scale 1:600. 50 ft. to 1 in.
Also shows factories, commercial occupancy of buildings, property boundaries, and house and block numbers.
Fire insurance map hand colored to show building construction, locations of windows and doors, and available water facilities.
Originally issued as bound volume.
Partial cadastral map.
Sheets numbered 1-117
Shows towns of Bernice, Burham, Chicago Heights, Dolton, Glenwood, Globe Station, Lansing, Oak Glen, South Chicago Heights, South Holland, Steger, Thornton and West Hammond.
Symbol key on key map sheet.
title page, key map, and street index on 4 unnumbered sheets.

Sheet 1 includes symbol key and location map.
Partial cadastral map.
Fire insurance map hand colored to show building construction, locations of windows and doors, elevators, and available water facilities.
Also shows factories, commercial occupancy of buildings, property boundaries and house and block numbers.
